attributes.action: Ban smoking in prisoners cells, giving prison staff the same protection against second hand smoke as other employees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prison staff will not be allowed to smoke in Prisons as from the 1st july 2007, but prisoners can continue to smoke in their cell because it is deemed to be their living accommodation.Second hand smoke has been proven to damage peoples health and I request that there is a total ban on smoking in Prison including the grounds and prisoners cells. Prison staff have to enter cells as part of their every day duties.
Please give Prison staff the same protection as other workers by signing my E-Petition

government_responses.details:
